name: Aladino - Classic - Elegante
additionalNotes: The Aladino Classic will appeal to the cigar smoker who enjoys a cigar that has the look, feel and taste of cigars made in Cuba during the late ‘40s and early ‘60s. This Honduran puro sports a mouthwatering, rustic Habano seed maduro wrapper placed over a Corojo binder and a Habano seed filler. All of the tobaccos for the Classic were grown at the JRE Tobacco farms in Jamastran, Honduras. It offers a medium-strength and flavorful smoking indulgence that will take you back to a simpler time. The cigars are handmade at the Fabrica de Puros Aladino S.A. factory in Honduras.
